Specifically, I am trying to clean up the contract summary text so that it's more coherent and less random phrases and adjectives.

I've got a basic version up here:

LINKAGE TO CURSE PAGE

The file will only make changes on new contract generation so you'll have to start a new save or play through more of your career before it starts coming into effect.

I would love any feedback, advice, suggestions, vicious pummeling of my face for doing something stupid... ok, maybe not the last one.
